content:
My IG does not compile anymore on the build server: http://build.fhir.org/ig/hl7-be/hl7-be-fhir-referral-prescription/branches/master/failure/build.log

It seems to be missing an experimental attribute on the NameSystem resource from R5, but I am using R4. Can somebody help?

BTW: IG publisher 1.1.97 (local) does not have this issue...

@Jose Costa Teixeira
It's a known publisher bug. Try again with the release just created.
